A library that only people of a certain age usually visit can typically be found at a school. Schools provide library spaces for students to access books and resources that can help them with their studies, as well as provide a space for them to leisurely read for pleasure. Students are the primary demographic that visit school libraries, as they are the ones who are attending school and have access to the library.

School libraries are designed to help children and young adults learn and grow academically. They provide access to books, magazines, newspapers, and other materials that may be useful to students in their studies and research. They also provide access to computers and other technology, which can be used to help students with their coursework. School libraries have librarians who are knowledgeable and can help students find the resources they need.

School libraries can also be used as a place for students to relax and take a break from their studies. Many school libraries provide comfortable seating, tables, and couches, where students can read quietly or work on assignments. They also provide a place for students to collaborate on projects and assignments, as well as host club meetings or other social events.

In addition to providing educational resources, school libraries also promote reading for pleasure. Libraries typically carry a wide selection of fiction and non-fiction books, as well as magazines and comic books. This provides students with a variety of reading material to choose from, and encourages them to explore different genres and topics. Reading for pleasure can help students develop their critical thinking and comprehension skills, as well as provide them with an escape from their day-to-day lives.

Overall, school libraries are an important part of the educational experience, and are a great resource for students of all ages. They provide access to a variety of resources, a place to relax and take a break from studies, and a chance to explore new ideas and reading material. School libraries are an invaluable part of the learning process, and can be a great place for students of a certain age to visit.
